name: SMACK!
description:
After many years, John finally received his 15 minutes of fame: appearing on a local talk show. Unfortunately, during his excitement of being on Live Television, he accidentally blurted out his love for pineapple on pizza. Now, the cameras are on him for a different reason, as he becomes the centre of the biggest street fight in history.

If you do play this i would appreciate if you filled these out for the betterment of my game!
